data.title: Racing Club vs Gimnasia La Plata Prediction, Lineups & Odds
data.meta_description: Racing Club vs Gimnasia La Plata prediction and betting tips. Primera Division preview with odds, team news and lineups. Free football predictions.
data.text:
Racing Club Set to Deliver Victory

We’re heading to the Full-Time Result market and our betting prediction is for Racing Club to win. They have a strong chance of beating Gimnasia La Plata and the 1.60 makes plenty of appeal.

Match Preview & H2H

Racing approach this fixture after drawing 0-0 in the Primera Division against Huracán.

Gimnasia lost 1-0 in their previous match against Rosario Central. They managed to have 49% possession in this Primera Division match.

Gimnasia La Plata won against Racing Club by a 3-1 scoreline when the teams last met.

In the past 4 encounters, we have seen Racing Club win one time and Gimnasia La Plata land two victories. The other clash between the teams was a draw.

Racing Club – Last 10 League Games

Racing Club have 5 wins, 3 losses and 2 draws, averaging 1.8 goals from 6.5 shots on goal and 12.5 attempts. They have averaged 50.8% possession and 5.6 corners per match, conceding 1.0 goals and 4.3 corners from 4.4 shots on goal and 11.0 attempts.

Roger Martinez is the top scorer with 3 goals, while Adrian Martinez, Johan Carbonero and Gaston Martirena each have 2. Gaston Martirena has made the most assists with 2.

Gimnasia La Plata – Last 10 League Games

Gimnasia La Plata have 3 victories, 5 defeats and 2 draws, averaging 10.3 attempts, 5.0 shots on goal and 1.2 goals. They average 49.9% possession, 5.3 corners awarded and 4.2 corners against them, while 1.3 goals have been conceded from 5.8 shots on goal and 10.8 attempts.

Rodrigo Castillo and Matias Abaldo have scored 3, followed by David Zalazar with 1. Rodrigo Castillo and Matias Abaldo have had 2 assists in the previous 10 games.

Confirmed Lineups

Racing Club (confirmed lineup): Gabriel Arias, Marco Di Cesare, Santiago Sosa, Santiago Quiros, Gaston Martirena, Bruno Zuculini, Martin Barrios, Juan Elordi, Santiago Solari, Roger Martinez, Adrian Martinez.

Gimnasia La Plata (confirmed lineup): Marcos Ledesma, Juan Cortazzo, Leonardo Morales, Yonathan Cabral, Juan Pintado, Valentin Rodriguez, Lucas Nahuel Castro, Nicolas Garayalde, David Zalazar, Rodrigo Castillo, Benjamin Dominguez.

Expert Analysis

It's important to understand the players who are unavailable for the upcoming action and the respective form of each team. If you want stats, you have come to the right place and they form the basis of our football predictions.

Key Racing Club vs Gimnasia La Plata stats:

Racing Club have not lost any of their last 10 home matches

Racing Club have won 7 of their past 10 home matches

Racing Club have scored 2 or more goals in 6 of their past 10 home matches

Racing Club have kept 5 clean sheets in their past 9 matches this season

Gimnasia La Plata have failed to win any of their last 10 away matches

Gimnasia La Plata have conceded 2 or more goals in 7 of their last 10 away matches

Gimnasia La Plata have lost 6 of their past 10 away matches

Gimnasia La Plata failed to score in 5 of their last 10 away matches

For this Primera Division fixture, we are going to bet against the visitors with our tip. We really like the 1.60 about the home team winning on the Full-Time Result market with the betting sites.

Racing Club are an even bigger price if you’re backing them on the Asian Handicap although you might need them to win by two goals or even three goals depending on your selection.

Published 06:22, 08 August 2024
